mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rpt_user_login_his (key_id,dev_ip,login_hour,login_count,data_time,insert_time) VALUES
(#{item.keyId}, #{item.devIp}, #{item.eventTime}, #{item.count}, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select key_id keyId,dev_ip devIp,login_hour,sum(login_count) login_count from ( SELECT key_id,dev_ip,login_hour,login_count FROM rpt_user_login_his where data_time = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT key_id,dev_ip,login_hour,login_count FROM rpt_user_login ) a group by key_id,dev_ip,login_hour
